title: A Sides and B Sides
description: Two quirky British inventors introduce a student to a problem-solving machine that runs on hair. A creative director's plans to disrupt the ad industry with in-dream advertising goes awry. Two stoners uncover the source of a desperate message sent through closed-captioning on a children's show.These are three of fourteen short stories in a debut collection inspired by song titles from bands like Ween, Guided by Voices, Luna and Camper Van Beethoven.Sit back and press play.
author: Evan Brown
